reused_details.reused: The 61-year-old De la Fuente, a former left back with Sevilla and Athletic Bilbao, helped Spain's under-19 squad win the European Championship in 2015, and the under-21 team win Euro 2019.

reused_details.reused: Former Barcelona boss Luis Enrique was first appointed Spain coach in 2018, bar a four-month period in 2019 when he stepped aside due to the illness and subsequent death of his young daughter.

reused_by_aic: "The RFEF has chosen Luis de la Fuente as the new (Spain) coach," RFEF said in a statement.
